title: # 335 - Josh Wolf & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Josh wolf to talk about biking from LA to Vegas, Brody Stevens, fighting, Chelsea Handler, escape rooms, and the grossest thing our kids have ever done.

Follow Josh @comedianjoshwolf

Check out his show "Controlled Chaos" on Facebook

This episode is brought to you by Mercari. Don’t let your old stuff go to waste. You can find Mercari on the app stores or at www.mercari.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% off, free shipping, and a free travel bag by using the offer code "Bert" at www.manscaped.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. To get started for just $5 go to www.forhims.com/bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Square Space. For a free trial go to www.squarespace.com and use the offer code “Bertcast” and save 10% on your first purchase of a website or domain. 

Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
